EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2022FY-HP-ENT-HEALTH-PLAN-NURTURE.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Health plan peer insights about a virtual-first approach
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How health plan leaders are transforming the healthcare journey We met with a group of health plan leaders to better understand their overall virtual care strategy and the role it plays—or will play—to address a wide range of whole-person needs. Topics from this roundtable discussion ranged from transforming care delivery and improving the member experience through methods such as hybrid models of care, to cost containment and alignment of payment models. “Everyone needs hybrid care. Access is a huge piece, but the experience has to be transformative.” –Roundtable participant This thought-provoking discussion explores the challenges and solutions health plan leaders like you are seeing as care models move from episodic to whole-person care.
Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/article/power-a-virtual-first-approach-with-primary-care/?utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_content=health-plan&utm_campaign=2022fy-hp-oth-em-health-plan-nurture]]> About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
